name: Gay Shit; Quest for Autism
description:
Gay Shit; Quest for Autism (gsqfa) is proof that the human race must stop asking what we CAN do, and start asking what we SHOULD do.

Made by two autists with too much time on their hands.

This game includes:

  • Sans Undertale in every single room!
  • Extremely cynical and somewhat offensive humor!
  • Joke thievery from the Absolute Garbage series!
  • Terrible bastardizations of beloved characters!
  • Way too many inside jokes!
  • Beans!
  • 10 Party Members!
  • Default VX ACE assets!
  • a sequel probably
  • AND MORE!

Made by two autists with too much time on their hands, and made to look like it was made in a day. (even though it took like 5-6 months)

Heres the game this was inspired by
